markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Invoke Disaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=350) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 139 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wind Caller](/Feats.aspx?ID=334)

</column>

---

You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes. You gain the [_storm lord_](/Spells.aspx?ID=477) order spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Invoke Disaster
